website_summaries.verdict: The Asics HyperGel SAI wasn’t very well-received. While people thought that this road shoe had a midsole that was reactive and a façade that was visually appealing, they didn’t react well to the rest of its aspects. The upper unit was criticized for not being breathable and adaptive to the shape of the foot. The sizing scheme and width profiles were also held negative regard.
pros: The designed and color schemes of the Asics HyperGel SAI were lauded by its purchasers
The underfoot cushioning system received appreciation for being responsive and springy
A few users mentioned that the shoe is comfortable
Some wearers lauded the outsole durability of the HyperGel SAI
cons: Several people complained that the Asics HyperGel SAI was too big, even when sizing down from their regular choices
Most of those who have tested this shoe felt that it was too narrow
It was difficult to wear this shoe, according to a few people

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best shoes in terms of fit/Form and functionality. Looks ever better once you wear them and just simply different in every way .These are comfortable and can be used for all sorts of work out .I wish they could come out with more brighter colors but over all a great shoe .
customer_reviews.author: farrukh

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like
customer_reviews.text: Sole and cushion appears of high quality, however is narrow. The textile upper is low quality and has a narrow toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R.

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a little tight to get on, but the fit is good once the shoe is on. Shoes are comfortable and we like them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Customer DBG

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: From an aesthetic perspective the shoes are pleasing! Ergonomically this shoes do not feel right, too tight around the heel. Shoes gave me blisters on first day of wearing. Save money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits around ankle like a sock. Fits like a size smaller then other ASICS shoes. I’ve work ASICS last 5 years. Sent these back
customer_reviews.author: Just a buyer

customer_reviews.title: sleeve on top not very flexible
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to insert the foot inside the shoe. I have to use a special tool to insert the feet in. After feet is in the shoe feels some pressure from the upper fabric. Have the shoe for couple of weeks now and it did not stretch as expected. Very disappointed from this shoe, Don't buy it unless you try it in the store first
customer_reviews.author: Elad Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Our second pair
customer_reviews.text: These are my son's second pair and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: C. Volk

customer_reviews.title: Tight out of the box but formed perfectly with wear
customer_reviews.text: A little tight out of the box but fit my feet like a glove after a bit of wear! Im 11 size and 11.5 wide so you would think they are too tight. However these are somehow magically made for my feet, and for the price i bought a second pair. Amazing. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: adam ondrusek

customer_reviews.title: WAYYYY TOO TIGHT/NARROW
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is way too narrow/tight for my foot. Just walking in these shoes is very uncomfortable. The elastic "sock" within the shoe is what ruins this shoe in my opinion. I will stick with my Asics Gel-Scram 5's for now.
customer_reviews.author: NickC56596

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Asics are one of my favorite running shoes. Never go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these running shoes. They look good and are really comfortable. They were perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Design has a tight fit. Lengtg was fine but not comfortable for my foot type. Better suited for flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Imitation
customer_reviews.text: This is for a very narrow foot only. Also seems like it's most likely a knock off Brand. Does not resemble a true Asics Brand Product.
customer_reviews.author: CMPS

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear size US 9. I bought a size US 9, it’s a tight fit. Should have gone for 9.5 or 10
customer_reviews.author: Michael Muia

customer_reviews.title: Broken eyelet! Runs tight!
customer_reviews.text: Runs small as most reviews say. But it came broken. I fixed it though so nbd.
customer_reviews.author: GinoBeauBino

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: I did go up 1/2 size per others reviews. I can't add my custom insoles it makes them too tight on the ankle. However, they fit well and wear fine without the insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lopez

customer_reviews.title: THERE ARE NOT REAL ASCICS
customer_reviews.text: This product is not a real Asics ... do not purchase them. As a sneaker overall, they are fine but if you are looking for the brand this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya strom

product_meta.title: ASICS - Womens Hypergel-Sai Shoes
product_meta.description: Designed with a fashion casual athletic upper and performance-driven features, HyperGEL-SAI transitions from workout to hangout for easy all-day wear. A new generation of ASICS signature GEL, the HyperGEL midsole offers premium cushioning, a responsive ride and exceptional durability. **FIT NOTICE** The HyperGEL-SAI has a new premium sock-like fit but also runs slightly shorter than standard. We recommend buying a half size larger. Weight: 10.35. Heel Height: 18mm. Forefoot Height: 10mm.
feature_bullets: HyperGEL Technology - High performance design with HyperGEL technology beads integrated into the midsole enhancing rebound and cushioning while reducing impact.
MONO-SOCK Technology Fit System - An elastic internal sleeve which replaces a traditional tongue providing a "sock-like" fit.
Asymmetrical Lacing Design - An anatomically correct lacing environment that reduces potential for irritation and provides improved comfort and fit.
